participant_1.background:
I enjoy the freedom of riding my bike.
One of my favorite things is shopping online.
I enjoy reading Jane Austen novels and talking to my mother about her life in Saudi Arabia.
i wear contacts.
I have a laptop because I move around a lot and need to be able to work on my computer wherever I am.

i enjoying keeping up with the news and learning about political issues.

i prefer headsets over earbuds.
I like to watch shows that are funny and lighthearted, because they help me relax and take my mind off of my worries.

content.text: Hello! I am a big fan of Jane Austen, what are some of your favorite books of hers?
Hi there! I love Pride and Prejudice, but I also really enjoy Emma. What about you?
I like Persuasion the best, but I also really enjoy Emma. I have read all of her books.
That is awesome! I have not read all of them, but I have read a few. I like that she writes about real people with real problems.
I agree! I also like the way she writes about love. It is always so romantic.
Yes, her love stories are always so sweet. What do you like to do for fun?
I like to read, shop online, and ride my bike. Do you have any hobbies?
I like to keep up with the news, watch funny shows, and spend time with my family. I also drive a minivan because it is roomy and comfortable for my family.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I also like to watch funny shows, but I do not have any kids.
I do not have any kids either, but I like to watch shows that are funny and lighthearted because they help me relax.
